bike.description: Specialized Ariel M4 Premium Aluminum double-butted women's fitness geometry and tubesets, smooth weld, w/ fender and rack braze-ons, forged dropouts, kickstand mount

Specialized double-butted, alloy Flat-Top bar, 31.8mm, 10-degree back bend
Specialized Women's Body Geometry XCT, Kraton rubber w/ gel, closed end, 120mm, lock-on
Shimano BRM-445, hydraulic disc brake w/ 160mm rotors
Shimano BRM-445 hydraulic disc brake w/ 160mm rotors
FDP light alloy, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Disc hub, loose ball, Hi Lo flange, machined disc side, dual lock nuts w/ 19mm contact, QR
Disc hub, loose ball, Hi Lo flange, machined disc mount, double-sealed, ground race, dual lock nuts w/ 19mm contact side, QR
